AR 82. Fatalities may be reported separately for those resulting from work-related injuries and those
resulting from work-related ill health.
Guidance on “work-related”
AR 83. Work-related injuries and work-related ill health arise from exposure to hazards at work.
Notwithstanding, other types of incidents can occur that are not connected with the work
itself. For example, the following incidents are generally not considered to be work-related,
